project_abstract.cdata: The project will control floods and improve land drainage in China's most industrialized and highly productive agricultural area.  It will also improve the quantity and quality of raw water for the Shanghai City water supply, and expand and improve inland waterway transportation.  Flood control and land drainage will be effected through river channelization of the Wangyu and Taipu Rivers to evacuate flood water to the Yangtze River, flood diversion through the Hang-Jia-Hu river system to Hangzhou Bay, and increased flood regulation in Tai Lake through strengthening and upgrading of the lake's perimeter dikes. The enlarged Wangyu River channel will be used to divert water from the Yangtze River to augment water supply in the basin during dry seasons.  Inland waterway transportation will be improved through more stable and controlled water levels and additional shiplocks constructed in rivers and canals. Institutional capability will be strengthened through better facilities for flood monitoring and forecasting, communication, staff training, technical assistance, and equipment.

P003597.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>太湖防洪项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将在中国产业化程度最高的高产农业区建设防洪工程，改造农田排水设施。项目也将增加上海市供水原水的数量，提高原水质量，扩大内河航运规模，改善航运条件。防洪和农田排水功能将通过以下渠道加以实现：（1）通过望虞河和太浦河河道渠化工程把洪水排入长江；（2）经由航嘉湖水系分洪；（3）通过加固并升级环太湖大堤提升太湖的洪水调节能力。拓宽后的望虞河河道将用于旱季从长江引水，以增加流域内供水量。通过更稳定地控制水位，增加河流和运河船闸数量，将改善内河航运条件。借助更好的洪水监测和预报设施及通信设施、人员培训、技术援助和设备提供，机构能力将得到增强。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
